name: Jewels

items.alias: Gold Filigree Ring set with a Perfectly Cut Gem

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a Ring or Bracer (ie:#L "Engagement Ring" "136603") #L "Generic Ring Template" "151365" #L "Personal Furnace" "150930" #L "Precious Metal Reclaimer" "150929" #L "Wire Drawing Machine" "150917" And, if you want to crimp it : #L "Perfectly Cut Gem" "151552" #L "Recipe" "/tell recipe 117" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Precious Metal Reclaimer + a Ring or Bracer = an Ingot (ie:#L "Small Gold Ingot" "151369") Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Personal Furnace + an Ingot = Liquid Metal (ie:#L "Liquid Gold" "151372") Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Wire Drawing Machine + Liquid Metal = Metal Wire (ie:#L "Gold Filigree Wire" "151368") Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Generic Ring Template + Metal Wire = Precious Metal Filigree Ring (ie:#L "Gold Filigree Ring" "151375") Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ From this point, two paths are possible... either sell this ring or crimp it with a Valuable Stone to make it even more valuable. to crimp it, follow this recipe: ------------------------------ Perfectly Cut Stone + Precious Metal Filigree Ring = Crimped Ring (ie:#L "Gold Filigree Ring set with a Perfectly Cut Gem" "151541") Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Considering the time involved in the matching of QLs and the actual crafting, it's not really worth it for me. But if you have some Mechanical Engineering Skill, it may still be interesting... Making Jewels with SL stones will give you some little buff according to this : Almandine - Strength / Agility Amber - Melee init / Psychic Init / Ranged Init Aquamarine - SensoryImp. / Psycho Mod / MaxHealth Balas Ruby - AddAllOff Black Opal - AddAllDef Chrysoberyl - Max Health / Heal Delta Coral - Nano Delta / Heal Delta / Max health Demantoid - MeleeDamageMod / ProjectileDamageM / EnergyDamageMod Diamond - SpaceTime / PshychoMod Emerald - BiologicalMet. / SensoryImprov. Fire Opal - FireAc / MaxHealth Jet - MaterialMet. / NanoC.Init Pearl - ChemicalAC / ColdDamageMod. Red Beryl - Stamina / Intelligence Ruby Pearl - Sense / Intelligence Sapphire - MaterialMet. / BiologicalMet / MaxNcu Star Ruby - MaterialCreation / SpaceTime / MaxNanoEnergy Topaz - EnergyAC / ProjectileAC Water Opal - NanoDelta / MaxNanoEnergy White Opal - ColdAC / PoisonAC
